#summary Overview of the appplication use to discover and test api features

= Introduction =

As the new Delcampe API is accessible with Soap, you don't need anything more than the wsdl uri and your apikey  but this project provide you a demo/sandbox application to discover features of the service.

= Details =

The first version of the demo is build in php based on ZendFramework.

We Hope to your contribution to complete them with  port on other languages.

The demo can be an interesting tool for developer to test or understand the soap implementation of the Delcampe API.
